org.syntaxes.fortress

Class Colors

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.syntaxes.fortress.Colors

  • public class Colors
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all the ANSI color codes, stored in variables. Forked from Small Telnet Chatserver by Wiesner Thomas, and then modified by ABrambleNinja. Javadocs added by ABrambleNinja
    Author:
    ABrambleNinja and Wiesner Thomas

    • Method Detail

      • gotoxy

        public static java.lang.String gotoxy(int row,
                      int col)
        Returns the character that will take you to coordinates in the terminal window.
        Parameters:
        row - The row that you want
        col - The column that you want
        Returns:
        The ANSI string that takes you to those coordinates

      • strip_all

        public static java.lang.String strip_all(java.lang.String line)
        Removes all the formatting
        Parameters:
        line - The input to remove from
        Returns:
        The "clean" string

      • strip_vt100

        public static java.lang.String strip_vt100(java.lang.String line)
        Strips all the VT100 characters off
        Parameters:
        line - The input string
        Returns:
        The "clean" string
